name: eventbridgepoc
description: poc of event bridge for reference in internal blog

scripts.build: babel src -d build && npm run lint-fix
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file ../chat-packaged.yaml --stack-name chatService --region eu-west-2 --s3-bucket $CLOUDFORMATION_DEPLOYMENT_BUCKET --s3-prefix chatService --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --profile $AWS_PROFILE
scripts.publish: npm run package && npm run deploy && echo Finished!! ðŸ¥³
